projects.name: Autonomous Robot Localization with LiDAR – ROS2
description: Enhanced indoor/outdoor localization for a mobile robot in a nuclear inspection context by integrating LiDAR with GPS and odometry.
Developed mapping and sensor fusion modules in ROS2; validated algorithms in simulation and field tests.

projects.name: STM32 Gyroscope Driver Development – MPU6050
description: Designed and implemented a low-level driver enabling PC communication with an MPU6050 gyroscope module over I²C.
Achieved reliable data acquisition for real-time motion analysis.

projects.name: Single-Cycle Processor Design – VHDL
description: Designed and simulated a monolithic single-cycle CPU in VHDL.
Created comprehensive test benches to validate instruction set execution on FPGA.

projects.name: K Project – x86 Kernel Development (C, x86 Assembly)
description: Designed and implemented a custom x86 operating system kernel.
Set up GDT/IDT, implemented low-level drivers for serial, timer, keyboard, and ATAPI for CD-ROM support.
Added ISO 9660 filesystem parsing for file handling.

projects.name: TinyX Social Network Search Service – Quarkus, Redis, Elasticsearch (Java)
description: Developed search endpoints for a social network platform using Quarkus and Elasticsearch.
Implemented efficient indexing and query optimization for real-time post/user retrieval.
